attributes.action: No digital currency or ID wanted in UK
attributes.additional_details: It is not a democracy country when a Prime Minister makes such a decision himself without the referendum of the entire country behind him. It affects everyone’s lives and is far too intrusive into everyones personal lives and needs to be opposed or stopped.
attributes.background: Give the UK citizens the rights to choose by means of a referendum to whether we change to a digital currency and ID.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

It's not clear from your petition if you want the Government to hold referendums on introducing digital ID and a digital currency, or to commit not to introducing either.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Disband CBDC Taskforce & commit to not introducing Central Bank Digital Currency: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637859

Guarantee access to public services without need for a digital ID: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/633673
